metadata.creator: various
metadata.description:
This is an archive of various images collected through Facebook and other websites of the hardware to be used as references until more high resolution images appear.

Most of the images are of various pieces of the amiga board. with one reference picture of the A/ROSE ArcNet NuBus card, and two of the scanline converter, which as of yet this project does not know the specific use of this in the pod (main screen or mech status screen?).

High resolution images of the A/ROSE ArcNet NuBus card are coming soon, with plans for the full arcade boards soon!

Note: The Battletech Pod Archive Project is not affiliated in any way with FASA Corporation, Catalyst Game Systems, Virtual World Entertainment, Pirahna Games, or any other official Battletech entity. It is purely a preservation project, born out of our love for these systems.
